short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple Chrome extension that disables the 'hands up' button in popular Google Meets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you no longer have to worry about accidentally clicking the "hands up" button during a meeting when you really wanted to click to reaction button. To improve that and reduce the clicks by mistake and to have to apologize, this chrome extensi√≥n will help to the users to reduce the failure with three/four modes of caution:

- Mode 0: It doesn't nothing
- Mode 1: It put the button with low opacity
- Mode 2: It put the button with low opacity and smaller
- Mode 3: It hides the button
